```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

In order to run the Iris Interactive Shiny App run the main.R file.

This projects consist of:

* Iris Interactive.Rmd: A Notebook with interactive Shiny elements, describing the basic structure of the project.
* Iris interactive App: Shiny App.
* IrisInteractive.RData: The App uses a predefined workspace.
* Dashboard UI folder: Unused variant of an earlier version of the app.
* rsconnect folder: In order to publish the app to shinyapps.io.
